title: 14. Do More Expensive Wines Taste Better?
description: They should! It's a cardinal rule: more expensive items are supposed to be qualitatively better than their cheaper versions. But is that true for wine?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: They should! It's a cardinal rule: more expensive items are supposed to be qualitatively better than their cheaper versions. But is that true for wine?
